title: CSB Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 28 Scientist B Posts
description: The Central Silk Board (CSB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 28 Scientist B Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech can apply for the CSB Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to appl...
